long_description: The Brunton Torpedo 2600 Portable Battery works with the 12V power socket in your car or truck. The internal permanent lithium-ion battery lets you take the charge with you when you leave the vehicle. Compact 2,600mAh rechargeable power station. 2 standard USB output ports: USB 2.0 and microUSB. Permanent internal battery is charged using a microUSB cable that can be connected to any USB port, AC/USB plug or 12V DC vehicle accessory plug. LEDs on the Brunton Torpedo 2600 Portable Battery show if it is activated and charging, as well as indicating available power. Charge time: DC car socket: 2 -3 hrs.; USB: 3 hrs.; AC/USB: 3 hrs.
short_description: The Brunton Torpedo 2600 Portable Battery works with the 12V power socket in your car or truck. The internal permanent lithium-ion battery lets you take the charge with you when you leave the vehicle.
